info.name: FLOWFACT-API Collection (EN)
info.description: This Collection contains a selection of the most used API-Calls that are used for Customizing FLOWFACT or building Applications that are using the FLOWFACT-API.

request.description:
This Call creates a CognitoToken, that is used to authenticate against the FLOWFACT-API. Each Token that is returned from this Request is valid for about 15-30 Minutes. 
The API-Token that is used as a parameter for this call can be obtained inside the FLOWFACT-Software from the Wordpress-Connector inside the Settings.
The Upload an Edition Call needs a ZIP-File as Binary, which contains the Edition Folder

item.name: Show all users of the company
Show all Views for a Schema
Show all Entities of a Schema
